name: educationalappstore.com
tag_list: educational, apps, mobile, learning, studying, student, parents, teachers
overview:
The Educational App Store (EAS) is a dedicated app store for all mobile apps relating to education, learning and studying.

The EAS was launched in March 2012 with the sole purpose of providing a platform for the best mobile educational apps from around the world. The site has grown tremendously since its conception and is continuing to build a solid catalogue of innovative learning app technologies.

The store is ordered to help the tech-savvy and the not-so tech-savvy find the right tool for their educational needs, from parents wanting to develop their children’s skills to university students revising for finals.

As part of a commitment to supporting technology created by learners for learners, the store will be featuring apps developed by students of universities and colleges throughout the UK and beyond.
